CF-Indicator-Descr: ACLED naive Base-Model, calculated as a function of the average number of conflict events reported in ACLED over the last 6 months [average recent conflict events per month x number of months in forecasting time-window].
eCF-AbsErrorAdmin0_Desc: absolute forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-RelErrorAdmin0_Desc: relative forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-AbsErrorGlobal_Desc: absolute forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-RelErrorGlobal_Desc: relative forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRank_Desc: association of actual vs predicted ranking of top 100 at risk countries [kendall tau statistic; values from 1 (close agreement) to -1 (strong disagreement)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRankpVal_Desc: p-value for kendall tau statistic; null-hypothesis: no association between actual and predicted country ranking. P-value per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all p-values obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate ACLED + UCDP base-Model, obtained as the mean [connflict intensity] over the last 6 months, where the conflict intensity per country i and month m is calculated by combining ACLED and UCDP as (ACLED_im/ACLED_Tot_m + UCDP_im/UCDP_Tot_m)/2. Note this is an experimental metric to test aggregation of ACLED and UCDP for obtaining more comprehensive/alternative conflict representations that take into account both leading conflict data providers and may be useful in certain cases - please only use with care.
eCF-AbsErrorAdmin0_Desc: absolute forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. eCF-RelErrorGlobal_Desc: relative forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRank_Desc: association of actual vs predicted ranking of top 100 at risk countries [kendall tau statistic; values from 1 (close agreement) to -1 (strong disagreement)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRankpVal_Desc: p-value for kendall tau statistic; null-hypothesis: no association between actual and predicted country ranking. P-value per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all p-values obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each country i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).
eCF-AbsErrorAdmin0_Desc: absolute forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

eCF-RelErrorAdmin0_Desc: relative forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-AbsErrorGlobal_Desc: absolute forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-RelErrorGlobal_Desc: relative forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRank_Desc: association of actual vs predicted ranking of top 100 at risk countries [kendall tau statistic; values from 1 (close agreement) to -1 (strong disagreement)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRankpVal_Desc: p-value for kendall tau statistic; null-hypothesis: no association between actual and predicted country ranking. P-value per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all p-values obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate conflict forecast metric, calculated for each country i as the mean of normalized CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B values [mean(norm(CAST_totalevents_im), norm(VIEWS_fatalities_im), rank_norm(BSE_im))] per forecast time-interval [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).
eCF-AbsErrorAdmin0_Desc: absolute forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate ACLED + UCDP base-Model, obtained as the mean [connflict intensity] over the last 6 months, where the conflict intensity per country i and month m is calculated by combining ACLED and UCDP as (ACLED_im/ACLED_Tot_m + UCDP_im/UCDP_Tot_m)/2. Note this is an experimental metric to test aggregation of ACLED and UCDP for obtaining more comprehensive/alternative conflict representations that take into account both leading conflict data providers and may be useful in certain cases - please only use with care.

eCF-AbsErrorGlobal_Desc: absolute forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-RelErrorGlobal_Desc: relative forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRank_Desc: association of actual vs predicted ranking of top 100 at risk countries [kendall tau statistic; values from 1 (close agreement) to -1 (strong disagreement)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRankpVal_Desc: p-value for kendall tau statistic; null-hypothesis: no association between actual and predicted country ranking. P-value per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all p-values obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Conflict Forecast Barcelona. Forecasted risk for onset of any violence in the next (3 or 12) months, as given in [Date-StartForecastInterval,Date-EndForecastInterval], following BSE and UCDP definitions and codebook (BSE columns: anyviolence_3, anyviolence_12). Note: should be used for countries that are not yet in conflict as it is predicting the onset of new conflict.
eCF-AbsErrorAdmin0_Desc: absolute forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-RelErrorAdmin0_Desc: relative forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-AbsErrorGlobal_Desc: absolute forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-RelErrorGlobal_Desc: relative forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRank_Desc: association of actual vs predicted ranking of top 100 at risk countries [kendall tau statistic; values from 1 (close agreement) to -1 (strong disagreement)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRankpVal_Desc: p-value for kendall tau statistic; null-hypothesis: no association between actual and predicted country ranking. P-value per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all p-values obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each country i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).
eCF-AbsErrorAdmin0_Desc: absolute forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate ACLED + UCDP base-Model, obtained as the mean [connflict intensity] over the last 6 months, where the conflict intensity per country i and month m is calculated by combining ACLED and UCDP as (ACLED_im/ACLED_Tot_m + UCDP_im/UCDP_Tot_m)/2. Note this is an experimental metric to test aggregation of ACLED and UCDP for obtaining more comprehensive/alternative conflict representations that take into account both leading conflict data providers and may be useful in certain cases - please only use with care.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each country i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate ACLED + UCDP base-Model, obtained as the mean [connflict intensity] over the last 6 months, where the conflict intensity per country i and month m is calculated by combining ACLED and UCDP as (ACLED_im/ACLED_Tot_m + UCDP_im/UCDP_Tot_m)/2. Note this is an experimental metric to test aggregation of ACLED and UCDP for obtaining more comprehensive/alternative conflict representations that take into account both leading conflict data providers and may be useful in certain cases - please only use with care.

eCF-KendallTauRank_Desc: association of actual vs predicted ranking of top 100 at risk countries [kendall tau statistic; values from 1 (close agreement) to -1 (strong disagreement)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRankpVal_Desc: p-value for kendall tau statistic; null-hypothesis: no association between actual and predicted country ranking. P-value per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all p-values obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each country i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-RelErrorAdmin0_Desc: relative forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

eCF-KendallTauRank_Desc: association of actual vs predicted ranking of top 100 at risk countries [kendall tau statistic; values from 1 (close agreement) to -1 (strong disagreement)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRankpVal_Desc: p-value for kendall tau statistic; null-hypothesis: no association between actual and predicted country ranking. P-value per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all p-values obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate ACLED + UCDP base-Model, obtained as the mean [connflict intensity] over the last 6 months, where the conflict intensity per country i and month m is calculated by combining ACLED and UCDP as (ACLED_im/ACLED_Tot_m + UCDP_im/UCDP_Tot_m)/2. Note this is an experimental metric to test aggregation of ACLED and UCDP for obtaining more comprehensive/alternative conflict representations that take into account both leading conflict data providers and may be useful in certain cases - please only use with care.

CF-Indicator-Descr: ACLED CAST. Forecasted number of battle events in (3 or 6)-month interval, as given in [Date-StartForecastInterval,Date-EndForecastInterval], following ACLED and CAST definitions and codebook (ACLED column: battles_forecast).
eCF-AbsErrorAdmin0_Desc: absolute forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-RelErrorAdmin0_Desc: relative forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-AbsErrorGlobal_Desc: absolute forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-RelErrorGlobal_Desc: relative forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRank_Desc: association of actual vs predicted ranking of top 100 at risk countries [kendall tau statistic; values from 1 (close agreement) to -1 (strong disagreement)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRankpVal_Desc: p-value for kendall tau statistic; null-hypothesis: no association between actual and predicted country ranking. P-value per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all p-values obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate ACLED + UCDP base-Model, obtained as the mean [connflict intensity] over the last 6 months, where the conflict intensity per country i and month m is calculated by combining ACLED and UCDP as (ACLED_im/ACLED_Tot_m + UCDP_im/UCDP_Tot_m)/2. Note this is an experimental metric to test aggregation of ACLED and UCDP for obtaining more comprehensive/alternative conflict representations that take into account both leading conflict data providers and may be useful in certain cases - please only use with care.
eCF-AbsErrorAdmin0_Desc: absolute forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. eCF-RelErrorGlobal_Desc: relative forecast error global average last year [abs(actual-prediction)/actual, for actual>0], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRank_Desc: association of actual vs predicted ranking of top 100 at risk countries [kendall tau statistic; values from 1 (close agreement) to -1 (strong disagreement)], computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-interval. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.
eCF-KendallTauRankpVal_Desc: p-value for kendall tau statistic; null-hypothesis: no association between actual and predicted country ranking. P-value per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all p-values obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate conflict forecast metric, calculated for each country i as the mean of normalized CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B values [mean(norm(CAST_totalevents_im), norm(VIEWS_fatalities_im), rank_norm(BSE_im))] per forecast time-interval [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).
eCF-AbsErrorAdmin0_Desc: absolute forecast error per country [abs(actual-prediction)] computed from previous conflict and conflict forecast data covering the last year as test-period. Error estimate per forecasting time-interval computed as the average of all errors obtained for time-intervals of similar length during the test-year.

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each country i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each country i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).
